inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| summarize LogVolume=count() by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| summarize ThreatVolume=count() by DeviceEventClassID, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceEventClassID, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//trend by sevearity
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| summarize SeverityCount = count() by LogSeverity , TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks' 
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC' 
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'end' 
| extend Reason= extract(';reason=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions)
| summarize ReasonCount= count() by  Reason, TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Reasons for session ending, by time

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceAction, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| summarize ThreatVolume=count() by DeviceEventClassID
| top 5 by ThreatVolume desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceAction

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| summarize EventCount= count() by DeviceEventClassID

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Data sent outbound vs inbound
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| extend Direction=iff(DeviceCustomString4=~'Trust','Outbound' ,'Inbound' )
| summarize DataSentOutBoundMB=sumif(SentBytes, Direction=~'Outbound')/1048576,   DataRecievedInboundMB=sumif(ReceivedBytes, Direction=~'Inbound')/1048576 by TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Sent and received data, by volume

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction contains 'block'
| summarize ProtocolCount=count()  by ApplicationProtocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 blocked URLs, by application protocol

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('block-url', 'block-continue')
| summarize CategoryCount=count() by DeviceCustomString2
| project-rename CategoryName= DeviceCustomString2
| top 5 by CategoryCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('block-url', 'block-continue')
| summarize URLCount=count() by RequestURL
| top 5 by URLCount desc

| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'

| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| summarize ProtocolCount=count() by ApplicationProtocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('alert', 'continue')
| summarize URLCount=count() by RequestURL

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| summarize ActionCount=count() by DeviceAction

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction contains 'block'
| extend PAReferer= extract(';PanOSReferer=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions)
| where PAReferer !=''
| summarize RefererCount= count() by PAReferer
| top 5 by RefererCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('alert', 'continue')
| summarize CategoryCount=count() by DeviceCustomString2
| project-rename CategoryName= DeviceCustomString2
| top 5 by CategoryCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID  =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction !contains 'block'
| summarize ProtocolCount=count()  by ApplicationProtocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount desc

inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'

| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| summarize ActionCount=count() by DeviceAction, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('alert', 'continue')
| summarize IPCount=count() by SourceIP
| top 5 by IPCount  desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 allowed web traffic source IP addresses

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where DeviceCustomString4  =~ 'Trust'
| where DeviceAction contains  'drop'
| summarize Attempts=count() by DestinationIP
| top 5 by Attempts desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 blocked IP addresses from outbound destinations

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Public IP Addresses Allowed
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where DeviceCustomString4  =~ 'Trust'
| where DeviceAction !contains  'drop'

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| extend Direction=iff(DeviceCustomString4=~'Trust','Outbound' ,'Inbound' )
| summarize DataSentOutBoundMB=sumif(SentBytes, Direction=~'Outbound')/1048576 by SourceIP
| top 5 by DataSentOutBoundMB desc

content.Query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| extend Direction=iff(DeviceCustomString4=~'Trust','Outbound' ,'Inbound' )
| summarize DataSentMB=sumif(SentBytes, Direction=~'Outbound')/1048576 by SourceIP
| top 5 by DataSentMB desc

CommonSecurityLog

| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'url'
| where DeviceAction in ('block-url', 'block-continue')
| summarize IPCount=count() by SourceIP
| top 5 by IPCount  desc

inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'  
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'  
| where Activity =~ 'TRAFFIC'  
| where DeviceCustomString4  =~ 'Untrust' 
| where DeviceAction !contains  'drop'  
| summarize Attempts=count() by DestinationIP  
| top 5 by Attempts desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Palo Alto File Category By Action Summary
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks' 
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'file' 
| extend PACategory= extract(';cat=(.*?);',1,AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize CategoryCount=count() by PACategory

content.PartTitle: Summary of Palo Alto file categories, by activity

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'PAN-OS'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where Activity =~ 'THREAT'
| where DeviceEventClassID =~ 'file'
| summarize ActionCount=count() by DeviceAction, TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Compare allowed and denied files, by time
